derivation: neuter of a presumed derivative of G4245 (πρεσβυτέριον);
strongs_def: the order of elders, i.e. (specially), Israelite Sanhedrin or Christian "presbytery"
outline:
1. body of elders, presbytery, senate, council
    1. of the Jewish elders
    2. of the elders of any body (assembly) of Christians
